title: JSON Schema for Plugable Tray (ptray) specification files

interval.description: The interval in seconds of the execution

command.description: The command to run, if the result error code is not zero, the specification fails

items.description: Every array element is one part of th command separated by space and without quotes

filter.description: The strategy to filter the result provided by the command, the output of this step is a dictionary of integer->string

all.description: The result will be used entirely as as single string by the next steps, outputs {0: entire_command_output}

lines.description: Only the received lines indices will be extracted from the result, outputs {line: command_output_line}, missing lines are ignored

match.description: Search for a pattern (https://docs.python.org/3/library/re.html) in the result, groups are ignored, outputs {match_order:match_string}

extract.description: An array of rules to extract helpful information from the filtered dicts using patterns

key.description: The index selector, can be an array of indices or a range, if some rules are overlapping indices, the latter is persisted

data.description: The data extractor, a string pattern with groups (groups are indexed together in the result, being accessible by name or order), the entire match is always available at group 0, mismatches return null to the next step
